paragraphs: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience architecting and deploying intelligent systems that combine machine learning, data engineering, and scalable software design.
Adept at leveraging Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch to build production-grade models and deploy them on cloud-native environments such as AWS and GCP.
Demonstrated success in improving model accuracy, latency, and reliability through robust experimentation, optimization, and MLOps best practices.
Passionate about bridging research and engineering to deliver AI-driven solutions that enhance automation, insight generation, and user experience at scale.
